name: Heirloom
description:
It's your time to begin the pilgrimage your ancestors have done for decades, will you be able to come back in one piece or will you perish along the way?


Heirloom is a small 2D platformer inspired by retro games, 1bit and textmode art.


Run, jump and avoid obstacles through 4 simple but challenging levels. Explore a beautiful, hand-crafted pixel world. Meet captivating NPCs and venture up to the Old Summit and back to retrieve the family Heirloom.

Features

  • 4 hand-crafted levels
  • 5 unique areas to explore
  • A peculiar ability to discover
  • Death counter so you can keep track of all your failures
  • Captivating NPCs
  • A rich story unveiling the family tradition
  • Old school CRT monitor effect
  • Minimalist pixel art graphics
